about_the_game:
Give Heixing more costumes to wear!

This DLC contains 4 additional costumes for Heixing, themed around gangsters of the 1920s, America at The Prohibition, and Sweepers of modern days.

  • Costume: Black Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: White Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: Combat Sweeper - Heixing

※ You can obtain those costumes automatically when you enter your office.
※ These costumes are available after Heixing joined your team.
detailed_description:
Give Heixing more costumes to wear!

This DLC contains 4 additional costumes for Heixing, themed around gangsters of the 1920s, America at The Prohibition, and Sweepers of modern days.

  • Costume: Black Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: White Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: Sweeper - Heixing
  • Costume: Combat Sweeper - Heixing

※ You can obtain those costumes automatically when you enter your office.
※ These costumes are available after Heixing joined your team.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP 1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3220 @ 3.3 GHz, AMD FX 4300 @ 3.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650 with 1 GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP 1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500, AMD RYZEN 2500X or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6G, AMD Radeon RX 580 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers

short_description: This DLC contains 4 additional costumes for Heixing, themed around gangsters of the 1920s, America at The Prohibition, and Sweepers of modern days.
